section.title: Breeder Distribution Variance by Warehouse
section.para: A Breeder Item is an Item from which other Items--or by-products--are produced. To view breeder distribution variances by Warehouse, select the "Breeder Distribution Variance by Warehouse" option. The following screen will appear:
When viewing breeder distribution variances by Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display breeder distribution variances for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose breeder distribution variances you want to display.
Breeder distribution variances by Warehouse generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Breeder distribution variances by Warehouse generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists breeder distribution variances by Warehouse, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
